column3: Khaishan is so worried he is on the verge of saying something.
You can tell from the timidness of Khaishan's nod that he is worried by something.
Khaishan points to the north. The haste with which he extended his arm suggests there is something in that direction which requires your attention.
Oh, thank you so much. That was nearly the end of me. I must thank Khaishan as well for sending help.
I am quite impressed you understood that you were needed here. Working out exactly what the Qestir are trying to communicate is never easy.
They believe all words to be lies and as such never open their mouths. However, they are both loyal and honest─that is why so many are more than happy to do business with them.
Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.
Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.
The tension has finally left Khaishan's oh-so-expressive face. You take note of the message of thanks relayed via his warm gaze.
